title: Various cards for sale or trade
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: Various cards for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
The following cards in the link below are for sale or trade. If trading, I'm looking mainly for T213-2 HOFers. Payment by checks, money order, cash, paypal, gold or  silver. Feel free to email me with any questions. I'll try to price each card soon, but if you are interested in something let me know and I'll get you a price.

[url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/tradesalepage[/url]

[url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Thanks
Mike

A lot of great cards. I may be in contact very soon.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Hey Mike, PM sent on a few. Thanks........Matt

Cleaned up the page a bit and added a couple of cards. If you see something you like and feel I'm a little(or a lot) to high on prices make an offer. I would really like to trade for T213-2 HOFers or other LA issues.

Thanks
Mike

I'll take the Lancaster Red Roses PC.  Let me know via PM how best to send you the money.
